entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Alberta border. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
